mapper.select:
select info.id albumId, info.album_title, info.cover_url, info.include_track_count, info.is_finished, info.`status`, MAX(IF(info2.stat_type = '0401', info2.stat_num, 0)) as playStatNum, MAX(IF(info2.stat_type = '0402', info2.stat_num, 0)) as subscribeStatNum, MAX(IF(info2.stat_type = '0403', info2.stat_num, 0)) as buyStatNum, MAX(IF(info2.stat_type = '0404', info2.stat_num, 0)) as albumCommentStatNum
from album_info info left join album_stat info2 on info2.album_id=info.id
info.user_id=#{albumInfoQuery.userId}
and info.status=#{albumInfoQuery.status}
and info.album_title like CONCAT('%',#{vo.albumTitle},'%')
and info.is_deleted=0
GROUP BY info.id
